parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO scrape_runs (run_id, trigger_type, scrape_source, status, started_at)
VALUES ('{{ $json.runId }}', 'scheduled', '{{ $json.scrapeSource }}', 'running', NOW())
RETURNING id, run_id

parameters.query:
=UPDATE scrape_runs SET
  status = 'completed',
  profiles_found = {{ $json.newProfiles + $json.updatedProfiles }},
  new_profiles = {{ $json.newProfiles }},
  interactions_saved = {{ $json.interactionsSaved }},
  completed_at = NOW(),
  duration_seconds = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - started_at))::integer
WHERE run_id = '{{ $json.runId }}'
RETURNING *
